page.title: 03THE TOWN OF OTTERY
page.content: Ottery St Mary is situated in between East Hill and West Hill. There is a river that runs through and round Ottery and of course it is called the river Otter. We have three schools: a primary school, secondary school and a private school. In all the schools the pupils wear uniform. In the town we have three bakers that bake fresh bread, an axe shop, some of the butchers slaughter their own meat. The shops are very good and we have a variety of them. There are several churches: a Parish church, a United Reform the Roman Catholic the Plymouth Brethren and a Methodist Chapel. Our Parish Church was modelled on Exeter Cathedral so it is sort of a mini Exeter Cathedral . Up by the Parish Church there is quite a big library and it has a lot of books. There are
